pageContent: Purpose: To obtain insight into the long-term (5- to 10-year) effects of prostate cancer and treatment on bowel, urinary, and sexual function, we performed a population-based study. Prostate-specific function was compared with an age-matched normative population without prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Sexual dysfunction following radical prostatectomy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22744864/
